testcase.name: Verify all courses from homepages (names and professors) - Example #1.1

failure.message: The course Master thesis has no professor. ==> expected: <true> but was: <false>

testcase.name: Verify Assignment Links in Software Testing Course
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Software Testing course page.......................passed When the user sees the links for each assignment............................passed Then the user should receive a warning when an assignment link doesn't exist.passed And the user should verify the link format of each assignment link..........passed
